data.name: EvoluShip Demo
data.detailed_description:
Plot:
You pilot self-enhancing space ship along with its exotic AI and must defeat hordes of enemies behind your targets.

Features:
  • Roguelike and RPG elements;
  • 10 customizable attributes;
  • 9 unique weapons;
  • 4 enemies with 3 variations each for a total of 12;
  • 1 Boss.

data.short_description: You pilot self-enhancing space ship along with its exotic AI and must defeat hordes of enemies behind your targets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
